entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries or rain showers. Temperature falling to minus 1 this afternoon.
entry.summary: A few rain showers changing to a few flurries this morning. Risk of freezing rain early this morning. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Rainfall amount 2 mm except 10 mm in the heaviest showers. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this morning then increasing to 40 gusting to 70 this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 1 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 10 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 late this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming sunny in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Tuesday 10 January 2023
